name: Respawner
description:
THEY'RE BACK IN THE FIGHT, THANKS TO YOU!

It falls to you to get these short-tempered hard-core gamers respawned before their countdown timers run out, preferably where they won't get spawn-killed! Keep the players happy to avoid rage quits! If they build up enough anger icons they will disconnect! Move players, and spawn weapons to change the tide and maintain fairness. Balancing the match flow is the key to success in this satirical meta-game about first-person shooters.

CONTROLS:

Drag and drop AI players around the map. Drop them inside glowing respawn points before their countdowns end. Click gun icons to change weapon spawners.  

WASD - Camera Pan

Q/E - Camera Rotation

Scroll - Zoom

(Clearly it's a bucket of jank. We ran out of time. A for effort!)
